page.title: 20Why Live in Cheshunt?
page.content: Many families moved to Cheshunt because they wanted a larger house than they could afford in London.They had relatives living in the Cheshunt area and also found it a more peaceful relaxed environment than in London. Cheshunt is also convenient for those who travel to work in London as there is a frequent train service and a good road system. There are many recreational activities in the area for all age groups to enjoy.These include:fishing in the River Lea and in the disused gravel pits;tennis,squash,horseriding,swimming football,cricket,BMX riding and trainspotting.
